DOC.criteria: DOR : antral follicle count ( AFC ) less 5 , AntiMullerian hormone ( AMH ) less 1.0 ng/ml , previous total retrieve oocyte less 5 . Normal Control : antral follicle count ( AFC ) equal 5 , AntiMullerian hormone ( AMH ) equal 1.0 ng/ml , previous total retrieve oocyte equal 5 . Patient provide sign informed consent . Patient allergic history contraindication DHEAS usage .
